Module com.cv.c195
Package com.cv.c195

Class DatabaseController

java.lang.Object
com.cv.c195.DatabaseController
public class DatabaseController extends Object
Controls all functions of the database in the application. This includes opening and closing results sets, statements, and the database connection, as well as queries. It also contains the observable lists for the main tables.

  • Method Details

    • startDB

      public static boolean startDB()
      Checks databaseConnection.txt for database connection information. Uses given information to start the database connection.
      Returns:
      True if the database was successfully connected to. Else, false.

    • logIn

      public static boolean logIn(String un, String pw)
      Checks the passed in username and password arguments against the user information in the database, and logs the user in if it matches. The log-in attempt is recorder whether the log-in is successful or not.
      Parameters:
      un - - Username for the application
      pw - - Password for the application
      Returns:
      True if log-in was successful. Else, false.

    • query

      public static boolean query(String query)
      Executes the passed in query and stores the results in queryResults
      Parameters:
      query - - The query being executed
      Returns:
      True if the query was successful. Else, false.

    • getAllCustomers

      The list of all customers

    • getWeeklyAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getWeeklyAppointments()
      Returns:
      The list of all appointments from now to 7 days from now

    • getMonthlyAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getMonthlyAppointments()
      Returns:
      The list of all appointments from now to 30 days from now

      Parameters:

      updated - - The updated appointment to replace it
